'''Milk''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
The following NPCs give Milk after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
*[[Dongdong]] in [[Qingce Village]], [[Liyue]] (7 Milk)
*[[Yong'an]] in [[Liyue Harbor]], [[Liyue]] (5 Milk)
